A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For all the reasons everyone else has explained\, I'm disappointed in this movie.  I acally thought it was a good movie outside the Star Wars context\, but it doesn't respect the history that came before it. You don't have to change the way the Force works to bring the storyline into the future.\n\nFor me\, the most disappointing  part is the lack of long-term vision and character arcs.  That was my favorite part of the original six.
